column1: text
Without explaining the context, what are you and your SO's inside jokes?

Abortion megathread


Due to the high number of legislative actions happening in the United States, the moderation team has created this megathread for all of your abortion questions. Please keep in mind that despite much action happening in the US, not all of our users are American and our [Inclusivity policy](https://www.reddit.com/r/AskWomen/wiki/inclusivephrasing) should still be considered when posting.

All top-level comments must be in the form of a question. If you have multiple questions, post them in one comment as opposed to an individual comment for each question.

Please report any and all rule breaking. This thread may be locked if a respectful discussion cannot be had.

**Helpful links:**

[Planned Parenthood](https://www.plannedparenthood.org/)

[RAINN (Rape, Abuse, & Incest National Network)](https://www.rainn.org/)

[NARAL (National Association for the Repeal of Abortion Laws)](https://www.prochoiceamerica.org/)

[Planned Parenthood - Birth Control info & options](https://www.plannedparenthood.org/learn/birth-control)

[Scarleteen](http://www.scarleteen.com/)

[The Guttmacher Institute](https://www.guttmacher.org/)

What are some harmful things that movies are trying to normalize?


[removed]
Ladies who lost weight, what’s something that really changed the game for your weight loss journey?

What do you do when you get in one of those depressed, bored moods where nothing satisfies your boredom?


[removed]
How did you re-invent yourself and become who you truly wanted to be?
What was your most recent deep conversation with your SO about? Did you feel better after?
What video game are you currently playing?
Women who practice abstinence until marriage, how do you deal with your urges?
If you had to pick only one Pokemon to live with you in the modern day, which Pokemon partner would you choose?
What kind of compliment would you like to receive more often?
What's your apartment search tip?
How is an all female working environment?
How do you get others to treat you well and with respect?

What is the greatest investment you've made in yourself?


Be it an investment of time, money, energy, etc...

What career did you want to have when you were younger? Did you achieve this?


And go....!

What was something NOT NORMAL about your childhood that you only realized in hindsight?


[removed]
Women who have a successful career without a college degree, what do you do for a living?

What food were you eating "wrong" for way too long? How did you realize what the "right" way was?


Of course, right and wrong are mostly subjective in food, but there are a few objective truths in food too, so I'm interested in both.

Do you think some people are better off single? Why or why not?


[removed]
What makes you NOT want to get married?

How old were you when you were first sexualised?


I saw a tweet saying that most women are first sexualised as children/young teens, what's your story?
What is the story behind your Reddit username?
Women who post nudes of themselves to reddit, why? What do you get out of it, emotionally, socially, sexually, or financially?

What book are you currently reading and what do you think of it so far?


Or if you’re not currently reading something, what is the last book you read and how was it?
Do you honestly ever judge other women on what they are wearing and what is the clothing have you judged?
